newsitem.title: ITALY: Minimum rate 7.21 pct at Italy lira repo tender.
newsitem.headline: Minimum rate 7.21 pct at Italy lira repo tender.

text.p: The minimum rate at today's 16.0 trillion lire 28-day Bank of Italy repurchase tender was 7.21 percent, compared with 7.35 percent at the previous repo tender on January 23, the Bank said.
The average rate was 7.29 percent against 7.38 percent at the last repurchase pact for 8.5 trillion lire and 11 days.
The pact takes effect today and the securities are for resale on February 21. The Bank said it received 53 bids of which 43 were met in full and one in part.
